table.Name: wcms_EmailInbox
table.Title: dm_inbox
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_SiteID = @siteID { AND EmailInbox_Name @Search:EmailInbox_Name } { AND EmailInbox_From @Search:EmailInbox_From } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [EmailInbox_ID] ,[EmailType] ,[EmailInbox_From] ,[EmailInbox_To] ,DATEADD(hour, {@TIMEZONE}, EmailInbox_Date) as [EmailInbox_Date] ,[EmailInbox_Subject] ,[EmailInbox_Read] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[EmailInbox_ID] ,(case EmailInbox_Type when 1 then 'Contact' when 2 then 'Sales' when 3 then 'Booking' when 4 then 'A Require from User' when 5 then 'Appt' when 6 then 'SalesPage' else '' end) as [EmailType] ,'' + EmailInbox_Name + ' (' + EmailInbox_From + ')' as [EmailInbox_From] ,[EmailInbox_To] ,[EmailInbox_Date] ,[EmailInbox_Subject] ,[EmailInbox_Read] from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_SiteID = @siteID { AND EmailInbox_Name @Search:EmailInbox_Name } { AND EmailInbox_From @Search:EmailInbox_From } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT: Update wcms_EmailInbox set [EmailInbox_Read] = 1 where EmailInbox_ID = @editID select [EmailInbox_ID] ,EmailInbox_Name + ' (' + EmailInbox_From + ')' as [EmailInbox_From] ,[EmailInbox_To] ,[EmailInbox_Date] ,[EmailInbox_Subject] ,[EmailInbox_Message] ,[EmailInbox_From] as [ReplyAddress] ,[EmailInbox_File] ,[EmailInbox_Phone] ,[EmailInbox_Address] from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_ID = @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: delete from wcms_EmailInbox where EmailInbox_ID = @delID select 1
